mn86:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn86:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ranno pasenadissa kosalassa vijite coro angulimalo nama hoti luddo lohitapani hatapahate nivittho adayapanno panabhutesu.
mn86:2.2: Tena gamapi agama kata, nigamapi anigama kata, janapadapi ajanapada kata.
mn86:2.3: So manusse vadhitva vadhitva angulinam malam dhareti.
mn86:3.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
mn86:3.2: Savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya yena coro angulimalo tenaddhanamaggam patipajji.
mn86:3.3: Addasasum kho gopalaka pasupalaka kassaka pathavino bhagavantam yena coro angulimalo tenaddhanamaggapatipannam.
mn86:3.6: Etasmim, samana, magge coro angulimalo nama luddo lohitapani hatapahate nivittho adayapanno panabhutesu.
mn86:3.7: Tena gamapi agama kata, nigamapi anigama kata, janapadapi ajanapada kata.
mn86:3.8: So manusse vadhitva vadhitva angulinam malam dhareti.
mn86:3.9: Etanhi, samana, maggam dasapi purisa visampi purisa timsampi purisa cattarisampi purisa pannasampi purisa sankaritva sankaritva patipajjanti.
mn86:3.13: tatiyampi kho gopalaka pasupalaka kassaka pathavino bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn86:3.14: “ma, samana, etam maggam patipajji, etasmim samana magge coro angulimalo nama luddo lohitapani hatapahate nivittho adayapanno panabhutesu, tena gamapi agama kata, nigamapi anigama kata, janapadapi ajanapada kata.
mn86:3.15: So manusse vadhitva vadhitva angulinam malam dhareti.
mn86:3.16: Etanhi samana maggam dasapi purisa visampi purisa timsampi purisa cattarisampi purisa pannasampi purisa sankaritva sankaritva patipajjanti.
mn86:4.2: Addasa kho coro angulimalo bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
mn86:4.5: Imanhi maggam dasapi purisa visampi purisa timsampi purisa cattarisampi purisa pannasampi purisa sankaritva sankaritva patipajjanti.
mn86:4.7: Atha ca panayam samano eko adutiyo pasayha manne agacchati.
mn86:5.1: Atha kho coro angulimalo asicammam gahetva dhanukalapam sannayhitva bhagavantam pitthito pitthito anubandhi.
mn86:5.2: Atha kho bhagava tatharupam iddhabhisankharam abhisankhasi yatha coro angulimalo bhagavantam pakatiya gacchantam sabbathamena gacchanto na sakkoti sampapunitum.
mn86:5.5: Ahanhi pubbe hatthimpi dhavantam anupatitva ganhami, assampi dhavantam anupatitva ganhami, rathampi dhavantam anupatitva ganhami, migampi dhavantam anupatitva ganhami;
mn86:5.6: atha ca panaham imam samanam pakatiya gacchantam sabbathamena gacchanto na sakkomi sampapunitun”ti.
mn86:6.1: Atha kho coro angulimalo bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
mn86:7.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmata angulimalena pacchasamanena yena savatthi tena carikam pakkami.
mn86:7.2: Anupubbena carikam caramano yena savatthi tadavasari.
mn86:7.3: Tatra sudam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn86:8.1: Tena kho pana samayena ranno pasenadissa kosalassa antepuradvare mahajanakayo sannipatitva uccasaddo mahasaddo hoti:
mn86:8.2: “coro te, deva, vijite angulimalo nama luddo lohitapani hatapahate nivittho adayapanno panabhutesu.
mn86:8.3: Tena gamapi agama kata, nigamapi anigama kata, janapadapi ajanapada kata.
mn86:8.4: So manusse vadhitva vadhitva angulinam malam dhareti.
mn86:9.1: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo pancamattehi assasatehi savatthiya nikkhami diva divassa.
mn86:9.3: Yavatika yanassa bhumi yanena gantva yana paccorohitva pattikova yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho rajanam pasenadim kosalam bhagava etadavoca:
mn86:9.4: “kim nu te, maharaja, raja va magadho seniyo bimbisaro kupito vesalika va licchavi anne va patirajano”ti?
mn86:10.1: “Na kho me, bhante, raja magadho seniyo bimbisaro kupito, napi vesalika licchavi, napi anne patirajano.
mn86:10.2: Coro me, bhante, vijite angulimalo nama luddo lohitapani hatapahate nivittho adayapanno panabhutesu.
mn86:10.3: Tena gamapi agama kata, nigamapi anigama kata, janapadapi ajanapada kata.
mn86:10.4: So manusse vadhitva vadhitva angulinam malam dhareti.
mn86:11.1: “Sace pana tvam, maharaja, angulimalam passeyyasi kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajitam, viratam panatipata, viratam adinnadana, viratam musavada, ekabhattikam, brahmacarim, silavantam, kalyanadhammam, kinti nam kareyyasi”ti?
mn86:11.2: “Abhivadeyyama va, bhante, paccuttheyyama va asanena va nimanteyyama, abhinimanteyyama va nam civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharehi, dhammikam va assa rakkhavaranaguttim samvidaheyyama.
mn86:11.3: Kuto panassa, bhante, dussilassa papadhammassa evarupo silasamyamo bhavissati”ti?
mn86:12.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma angulimalo bhagavato avidure nisinno hoti.
mn86:12.2: Atha kho bhagava dakkhinam bahum paggahetva rajanam pasenadim kosalam etadavoca:
mn86:12.4: Atha kho ranno pasenadissa kosalassa ahudeva bhayam, ahu chambhitattam, ahu lomahamso.
mn86:12.5: Atha kho bhagava rajanam pasenadim kosalam bhitam samviggam lomahatthajatam viditva rajanam pasenadim kosalam etadavoca:
mn86:12.6: “ma bhayi, maharaja, natthi te ito bhayan”ti.
mn86:12.7: Atha kho ranno pasenadissa kosalassa yam ahosi bhayam va chambhitattam va lomahamso va so patippassambhi.
mn86:12.8: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo yenayasma angulimalo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam angulimalam etadavoca:
mn86:13.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma angulimalo aranniko hoti pindapatiko pamsukuliko tecivariko.
mn86:13.2: Atha kho ayasma angulimalo rajanam pasenadim kosalam etadavoca:
mn86:13.4: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn86:13.6: Yavancidam, bhante, bhagava adantanam dameta, asantanam sameta, aparinibbutanam parinibbapeta.
mn86:13.7: Yanhi mayam, bhante, nasakkhimha dandenapi satthenapi dametum so bhagavata adandena asattheneva danto.
mn86:13.8: Handa ca dani mayam, bhante, gacchama;
mn86:13.11: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
mn86:14.1: Atha kho ayasma angulimalo pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthiyam pindaya pavisi.
mn86:14.2: Addasa kho ayasma angulimalo savatthiyam sapadanam pindaya caramano annataram itthim mulhagabbham vighatagabbham.
mn86:14.6: Atha kho ayasma angulimalo savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma angulimalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn86:14.7: “idhaham, bhante, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisim.
mn86:14.8: Addasam kho aham, bhante, savatthiyam sapadanam pindaya caramano annataram itthim mulhagabbham vighatagabbham.
mn86:14.10: ‘kilissanti vata bho satta, kilissanti vata bho satta’”ti.
mn86:15.1: “Tena hi tvam, angulimala, yena sa itthi tenupasankama; upasankamitva tam itthim evam vadehi:
mn86:15.2: ‘yatoham, bhagini, jato nabhijanami sancicca panam jivita voropeta, tena saccena sotthi te hotu, sotthi gabbhassa’”ti.
mn86:15.3: “So hi nuna me, bhante, sampajanamusavado bhavissati.
mn86:15.4: Maya hi, bhante, bahu sancicca pana jivita voropita”ti.
mn86:15.5: “Tena hi tvam, angulimala, yena sa itthi tenupasankama; upasankamitva tam itthim evam vadehi:
mn86:15.6: ‘yatoham, bhagini, ariyaya jatiya jato, nabhijanami sancicca panam jivita voropeta, tena saccena sotthi te hotu, sotthi gabbhassa’”ti.
mn86:15.7: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma angulimalo bhagavato patissutva yena sa itthi tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam itthim etadavoca:
mn86:15.8: “yatoham, bhagini, ariyaya jatiya jato, nabhijanami sancicca panam jivita voropeta, tena saccena sotthi te hotu, sotthi gabbhassa”ti.
mn86:15.9: Atha khvassa itthiya sotthi ahosi, sotthi gabbhassa.
mn86:16.1: Atha kho ayasma angulimalo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
mn86:16.2: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
mn86:16.3: Annataro kho panayasma angulimalo arahatam ahosi.
mn86:17.1: Atha kho ayasma angulimalo pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
mn86:17.2: Tena kho pana samayena annenapi leddu khitto ayasmato angulimalassa kaye nipatati, annenapi dando khitto ayasmato angulimalassa kaye nipatati, annenapi sakkhara khitta ayasmato angulimalassa kaye nipatati.
mn86:17.3: Atha kho ayasma angulimalo bhinnena sisena, lohitena galantena, bhinnena pattena, vipphalitaya sanghatiya yena bhagava tenupasankami.
mn86:17.4: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam angulimalam duratova agacchantam.
mn86:17.7: Yassa kho tvam, brahmana, kammassa vipakena bahuni vassani bahuni vassasatani bahuni vassasahassani niraye pacceyyasi tassa tvam, brahmana, kammassa vipakam dittheva dhamme patisamvedesi”ti.
mn86:18.1: Atha kho ayasma angulimalo rahogato patisallino vimuttisukham patisamvedi;
mn86:18.17: Disa hi me te manuja bhajantu,
mn86:18.23: Na hi jatu so mamam himse,
